## Recommended SDK for bug and crash reporting [Instabug](https://try.instabug.com/react-native/?utm_source=awesomereact&utm_medium=spon&utm_content=header)

[![react-native](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9888943/35385975-e6829fc0-01d2-11e8-963f-2166c4a67763.gif)](https://try.instabug.com/react-native/?utm\_source=awesomereact&utm\_medium=spon&utm\_content=banner)

> We highly recommend integrating Instabugâ€™s framework as they compiled a lot of great features in their SDK that provides useful and rich data with each bug/crash report.
> They removed the hassle of debugging as the SDK automatically attach screenshots, screen recordings, device details, network logs and repro-steps with each bug report which speeds up development process. [_learn more._ ](https://try.instabug.com/react-native/?utm\_source=awesomereact&utm\_medium=spon&utm\_content=learnmore)ğŸš€
> [![](https://instabug-ga.appspot.com/UA-41982088-6/github/awesomereact?pixel)](https://instabug.com)
